title: Valley of Hinnom (Gehenna)
summary: The Valley of Hinnom is an important topographical feature surrounding historical Jerusalem from the west and southwest.[1] Its name in biblical Hebrew is "valley of the son of Hinnom" (ge ben hinnom) or "valley of the children (sons) of Hinnom" (ge beney hinnom).[2] Its Arabic name is Wadi er-Rababi.[2]
